document.masterDocTitle: Annotated catalogue of South American Dalodesmidae (Diplopoda, Polydesmida)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Annotated catalogue of South American Dalodesmidae (Diplopoda, Polydesmida)

bibRefCitation.author: Silvestri
bibRefCitation.refString: Silvestri, F. (1903) Note Diplopodologiche. Bollettino dei Musei di Zoologia ed Anatomia comparata, 18, 1 - 21. Available from: http: // biodiversitylibrary. org / page / 53519246 (accessed 26 June 2017)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Strongylosoma concolor Gervais, 1847
, by original designation

treatmentCitationGroup.paragraph:
Semnosoma
Silvestri 1903 : 2
(first description, in Latin), 3 (
Strongylosoma concolor
designated type species)

Semnosoma
Silvestri 1905b : 226
(republication of text from Silvestri (1903))

Semnosoma
Attems 1914 : 239
(in genus key; assigned to Sphaerotrichopidae )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Semnosoma
Chamberlin 1957 : 19
(in genus key), 29 (brief re-diagnosis; type species incorrectly given as
Semnosoma porteri
)

Semnosoma
Demange & Silva 1976a : 16
(discussion of genus), 19 (introducing species list before revision), 20 (new diagnosis)

Semnosoma
Jeekel 1982 : 12
(comments on
Semnosoma
gonopod, suggests that
Semnosoma
and
Gasterogramma Jeekel, 1982
from Tasmania "may form the nucleus of a tribe for which the family-group name
Semnosomatidae Brölemann, 1916
, is available")

Semnosoma
Golovatch 2014 : 267
(list of currently accepted species)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species
Chiliosoma porteri Brölemann, 1916
by original designation

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Chiliosoma
Brölemann 1916 : 556
(relationships), 599 (first description, in French), 600 (
Chiliosoma porteri
designated type species)

Chiliosoma
Attems 1926 : 145
(in genus key for Sphaerotrichopidae )

Chiliosoma
Demange & Silva 1976a : 18
(introducing species list before revision), 20 (new diagnosis; synonymised with
Semnosoma
)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species
Chilorus ovallenus Chamberlin, 1957
by original designation

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Chilorus
Chamberlin, 1957 : 19
(in genus key, assigned to Sphaerotrichopidae ), 24 (first description, in English;
Chilorus ovallenus
designated type species)

Chilorus
Demange & Silva 1976a : 17
(first synonymized with
Chiliosoma
), 18 (introducing species list before revision), 20 (listed as synonym of
Chiliosoma
)
